plot: Russ Murphy's grandfather has recently died and has left him something wonderful; directions to a potato farm in New England. Russ believes the directions are more like a deed. But the fair residents of Tuberville will set him straight.
plot_en: Russ Murphy's grandfather has recently died and has left him something wonderful; directions to a potato farm in New England. Russ believes the directions are more like a deed. But the fair residents of Tuberville will set him straight.
plot_es: Russ Murphy's grandfather has recently died and has left him something wonderful; directions to a potato farm in New England. Russ believes the directions are more like a deed. But the fair residents of Tuberville will set him straight.
title: Tuberville
